Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: Hello World

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

OSI model

Open Systems Interconnection model (OSI model) , . , , .

Definitions:

  • (Communication protocols): host.

  • Protocol data unit(PDU): , PDU, PDUpayload(service data unit ,SDU) protocol-related headers or footers .

  • : Layer highest, PDU, SDU; Layer lowest; ,PDU; ,,SDU.

Layer architecture

Layer 1: Physical layer

, between deviceraw digital bitselectrical,optical radio. USB.

Examples: Ethernet family 802.3 PHY(, ), 802.11 LAN & wireless(2.4Ghz, 5Ghz), BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy) PHY, E1.

Layer 2: Data link layer

, , frame. (node to node). (MTU)

Layer 3: Network layer

transfer packets. nodes, node, packetdestination. packetMTU, , , node. , , necessary.

Layer 4: Transport layer

(variable-length data sequences), QoS.

Layer 5: Session layer

Layer 6: Presentation layer

Layer 7: Application layer
